text: Squirrel fish Squirrel fish () is a well-known dish in Jiangsu cuisine, originally from Suzhou. It is prepared by deboning and carving a mandarin fish into an ornamental shape similar to a squirrel, and then deep-frying it in batter before dousing it in sweet and sour sauce. == References == Category:Fish dishes Category:Jiangsu cuisine
title: Squirrel fish
